comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_David_Weiss a songwriter songwritershalloffame.org/exhibits/C24 See www.vocalgroupharmony.com/rumors+.htm for another picture of the pair, using Bennie as the name. Both sources suggest that Weiss often partnered with Bennie (not Bernie) Benjamin. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bennie_Benjamin and songwritershalloffame.org/exhibits/C320
